textAfterTable: Size Chest Measurement (IN) Waist (IN) XS UK 8 25 - 27 22 S UK 10 27 - 28 24 M UK 12 28 - 30 25 L UK 14 30 - 32 26 XL UK 16 32 - 36 30 How To Find The Correct Swimsuit/Bikini/Bodysuit SizeWe know that purchasing clothing on the internet can lead to size mismatches,  but not at Blue Banana. We aim to deliver you the perfect size every time! In order to measure your swimsuit/bikini/bodysuit size, you need to measure in two key areas and then compare them to the size guide above: 1. Chest  Measure around the fullest part under the arms.  2. Waist  Measure around your natural waistline.
